page.title: 05DAY IN THE LIFE OF ....
page.content: The{digital}alarm goes off at seven ,so I get up,have a shower,get dressed in{school colours}and go downstairs for breakfast. For breakfast I have cereals or toast and jam. I watch {T.V.am}while I eat. By half past eight I am ready to walk to the Middle school.We spend the morning doing French and Science in the laboratory.For dinner I have sandwiches. After dinner we have P.E and Art.At 3.35 pm I walk home. I have something to eat and go out to play with my friend. After tea on Tuesday I go to the{guides}in the car I go to 1st Bewdley guides seven until nine. When I get back home I watch the Comedies , have something to eat and go to bed and read,{"Folly foot"}is my favourite at the momemt.
